text: Nabit (Nabt), or Nabdem (also Nabde, Nabte, Nabdam, Nabdug, Nabrug, Nabnam, Namnam), is a Gur language of Burkina Faso and Ghana. The proposal to create an ISO 639-3 code was rejected in January 2017. ==References== Category:Oti–Volta languages Category:Languages of Ghana Category:Languages of Burkina Faso Category:Articles citing ISO change requests
title: Nabit language
